Package meka.classifiers.multilabel

Class CC

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.classifiers.AbstractClassifier
      • weka.classifiers.SingleClassifierEnhancer
        • meka.classifiers.multilabel.ProblemTransformationMethod
          • meka.classifiers.multilabel.CC
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, MultiLabelClassifier, MultiXClassifier, MultiLabelDrawable, weka.classifiers.Classifier, weka.core.OptionHandler, weka.core.Randomizable, weka.core.TechnicalInformationHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BCC, CC, CCp, CCUpdateable, MCC, PCC

    public class CC
extends ProblemTransformationMethod
implements weka.core.Randomizable, weka.core.TechnicalInformationHandler, MultiLabelDrawable
    CC.java - The Classifier Chains Method. Like BR, but label outputs become new inputs for the next classifiers in the chain.
    See: Jesse Read, Bernhard Pfahringer, Geoff Holmes, Eibe Frank. Classifier Chains for Multi-label Classification. Machine Learning Journal. Springer. Vol. 85(3), pp 333-359. (May 2011).
    See: Jesse Read, Bernhard Pfahringer, Geoff Holmes, Eibe Frank. Classifier Chains for Multi-label Classification. In Proc. of 20th European Conference on Machine Learning (ECML 2009). Bled, Slovenia, September 2009.
    Note that the code was reorganised substantially since earlier versions, to accomodate additional functionality needed for e.g., MCC, PCC.
    Version:
    December 2013
    Author:
    Jesse Read
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • prepareChain

        protected void prepareChain​(int L)
        Prepare a Chain. One of the following:
        - Use pre-set chain. If there is none, then
        - Use default chain (1,2,...,L). Unless a different random seed has been set, then
        - Use a random chain.
        Parameters:
        L - number of labels

      • prepareChain

        public void prepareChain​(int[] chain)
        Prepare a Chain. Set the specified 'chain'. It must contain all indices [0,...,L-1] (but in any order)
        Parameters:
        chain - a specified chain

                                       throws Exception
        TransformInstances - this function is DEPRECATED. this function preloads the instances with the correct class labels ... to make the chain much faster, but CNode does not yet have this functionality ... need to do something about this!
        Throws:
        Exception

      • probabilityForInstance

        public double[] probabilityForInstance​(weka.core.Instance x,
                                       double[] path)
                                throws Exception
        ProbabilityForInstance - Force our way down the imposed 'path'.
        TODO rename distributionForPath ? and simplify like distributionForInstance ?
        For example p (y=1010|x) = [0.9,0.8,0.1,0.2]. If the product = 1, this is probably the correct path!
        Parameters:
        x - test Instance
        path - the path we want to go down
        Returns:
        the probabilities associated with this path: [p(Y_1==path[1]|x),...,p(Y_L==path[L]|x)]
        Throws:
        Exception

      • rebuildClassifier

        public void rebuildClassifier​(int[] new_chain,
                              weka.core.Instances D)
                       throws Exception
        Rebuild - NOT YET IMPLEMENTED. For efficiency reasons, we may want to rebuild part of the chain. If chain[] = [1,2,3,4] and new_chain[] = [1,2,4,3] we only need to rebuild the final two links.
        Parameters:
        new_chain - the new chain
        D - the original training data
        Throws:
        Exception

        public Map<Integer,String> graph​()
